user_stories.overview: Implement a comprehensive user registration and authentication system.
user_stories.request: Develop a system for users to register and log in securely using verified credentials.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can register with a phone number and upload necessary documents. Registration must be verified before the first login. Passwords are securely stored and encrypted.

tasks.task: Develop user registration and verification process
tasks.description: Implement user sign-up with phone number verification and document upload.

tasks.task: Implement secure login and session management
tasks.description: Develop mechanisms for secure user login and session handling.

tasks.task: Create frontend UI for registration and login
tasks.description: Design the UI for user registration and login processes on the mobile app.

user_stories.overview: Enable user profile management after registration.
user_stories.request: Allow users to set up and manage their personal profiles, including payment methods and preferences.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can update profile information including payment details. Users can set home/work locations and preferences for ride scheduling.

tasks.description: Create a user-friendly interface for updating profile information and preferences.

tasks.task: Implement backend API for profile updates
tasks.description: Ensure secure handling of user profile updates and storage of preferences.

user_stories.overview: Develop a smart matching algorithm to optimize ride-sharing.
user_stories.request: Create a real-time algorithm to suggest ride share options based on user routes and preferences.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Algorithm matches rides with similar routes and minimal detours. Provides estimated cost and time savings. Allows users to view and accept suggested rides.

tasks.task: Build matching algorithm for ride coordination
tasks.description: Implement a real-time ride matching algorithm considering user preferences and routes.

tasks.task: Validate matching algorithm with test data
tasks.description: Use simulated data to test and validate the efficiency of the matching algorithm.

user_stories.overview: Implement a transparent pricing and payment system for all transactions.
user_stories.request: Develop systems to calculate and display costs upfront and manage payment transactions securely.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can see estimated ride costs upfront. Secure payment processing and cost-splitting for shared rides is enabled.

tasks.task: Create cost calculation logic for ride estimates
tasks.description: Develop logic to generate upfront cost estimates for rides based on distance and sharing factor.
Implement a payment gateway to handle transactions and secure storage of payment information.

tasks.task: Design UI for cost display and payment confirmation
tasks.description: Ensure users have a clear understanding of costs before booking and receive payment confirmations.

user_stories.overview: Enhance user safety through comprehensive verification and in-app alerts.
user_stories.request: Implement user safety protocols including emergency support and secure rider interactions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Safety measures such as user verification, emergency button, and real-time tracking are implemented. Users and drivers have verifiable safety profiles.

tasks.task: Develop user and driver verification systems
tasks.description: Create processes to verify users and drivers upon registration for enhanced security.

tasks.task: Implement real-time tracking and emergency support
tasks.description: Develop features for riders to alert emergency services and share real-time location with specific contacts.

user_stories.overview: Provide real-time ride tracking and communications to enhance user experience.
user_stories.request: Integrate features that allow users to track rides in real-time and communicate with co-riders.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Riders can track the exact location of their ride in real-time. In-app messaging for ride coordination is available.

tasks.description: Integrate GPS technology for displaying real-time ride locations on the app.
Create a secure channel for users to communicate with co-riders within the app.
